price: (102) The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.[854]
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri wanaḥshuru al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan
